cast.overview: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.
cast.title: Suspiria

details.biography: Lela Svasta was best known for her work as Helena Markos, the antagonist of Suspiria (1977), for which she went uncredited. According to actress Jessica Harper, Svasta was not a professional actress, but a 90-year-old former prostitute who director Dario Argento found on the streets of Rome.
details.name: Lela Svasta
